DOC.brief_summary: Athletes use inhaled β2-adrenoreceptor agonist ( IBAs ) win disproportionate number medal . However , previous research show β2 agonist improve exercise performance either asthmatic non-asthmatic athlete . Although majority study show ergogenic effect , small number study extend exercise bout ( ~60 minute ) show advantage . The investigator believe control yet sport-specific exercise protocol elucidate ergogenic effect . Because IBAs may different effect two group athlete , investigator measure exercise performance female male elite cyclist . The investigator hypothesize athlete perform good combination steady-state/sprint exercise task follow salbutamol administration .
DOC.criteria: maximal oxygen consumption ≥60 ≥55 mL⋅kg1⋅min1 ≥5⋅L⋅min1 ≥4⋅L⋅min1 men woman pregnant woman history uncontrolled respiratory cardiac disease smoker diabetic
